text:
@costareports Juvenile name calling. You're actually reporting and giving credence to his crap!  

Try reporting on the mismanagement of the Coronavirus. His actual racism or yeh, being ok with Putin hiring assassins to kill our troops. 

Try calling him a liar!

Incredibly poor reporting.
